mapper.select: SELECT /* OtherArtistMapper.xml, searchArtistDetail, SAC 전시, 2014-03-05 */ ACTY_TYPE ,ACTY_YYPRD ,ARTIST_ID ,ARTIST_NM ,BIRTH ,CMPS_ARTIST_ID ,CMPS_ARTIST_NM ,DEBUT_DAY ,DEBUT_MUSIC_ID ,DEBUT_MUSIC_NM ,IMG_FILE_PATH as imagePath ,NATY as country FROM TB_DP_ARTIST WHERE ARTIST_ID = #{artistId}
